intro: Pentanema × medium, commonly known as the hybrid pentanema, is a flowering plant belonging to the Rubiaceae family. It is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that typically bloom in shades of white or pale yellow. The plant has opposite, simple leaves that are often elliptical in shape and have a smooth or slightly hairy surface. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in tropical and subtropical regions. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens and greenhouses.
